    dcl_texcoord v0
    dcl_2d s0

    dcl_2d s2

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_1951D1A2_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s13
mov r6, v0
add r7.w, r6.w, -r7.y
mad r6.x, r7.w, r7.x, r6.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r6.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r6.x
      mov r1.yz, r6.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    add r0.y, c4.z, r6.z
    add r0.z, r0.y, c8.x
    log r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, c8.y
    mov r0.w, c4.w
    mad r0.w, r0.z, r0.w, c8.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.x
    mad r0.z, r0.z, -c6.x, c6.y
    add r0.z, r0.z, -c8.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.z
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.y, r0.y, c6.z
    dp2add r2.x, c8.w, r0.y, r6.x
    mov r2.yz, r6.xyww
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r2, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r0.yz, c6
    add r0.x, r0.y, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, -c2.x
    rcp r0.w, r6.w
    mul r1.xy, r0.w, r6
    mul r1.xy, r0.x, r1
    mul r2, r1.y, c10

// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_1951D1A2_0.txt

mad r1.x, -r7.w, r7.x, r1.x

    mad r1, c9, r1.x, r2
    mad r1, c11, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c12
    rcp r0.x, r1.w
    mul r0.xw, r0.x, r1.xyzy
    mul r1.xy, r0.xwzw, c13
    frc r1.xy, r1
    mad r0.xz, r0.xyww, c13.xyyw, r0.z
    add r0.xz, -r1.xyyw, r0
    add r2, r0.xzxz, c7.xxxy
    mul r2, r2, c14.xyxy
    mul r3, r2.xyxx, c6.yyww
    texldl r3, r3, s2
    max r0.w, c7.z, -r1.z
    add r1.z, r0.w, r3.x
    mad_sat r3.x, r1.z, c13.z, r0.y
    mul r2, r2.zwxx, c6.yyww
    texldl r2, r2, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r2.x

    add r2, r0.xzxz, c7.xwyx

    add r1.z, r0.w, r5.x

    add r0.x, r0.w, r4.x

    mad oC0, r0.x, r1, c0
